credentialsdescription: Please provide your username and password to login on
confirmdeletesite: Are you sure you want to delete the site {{sitename}}?
erroraccesscontrolalloworigin: The Cross-Origin call you're trying to perform has been rejected. Please check https://docs.moodle.org/dev/Moodle_Mobile_development_using_Chrome_or_Chromium
errordeletesite: An error occurred while deleting this site. Please try again.
errorupdatesite: An error ocurred while updating the site's token.
helpmelogin:
This app can only connect to Totara LMS sites that have specifically enabled Mobile app access.

If you can't connect to your Totara LMS site then you need to contact a Totara LMS administrator at the place where you want to connect.
invalidaccount: Please check your login details or ask your site administrator to check the site configuration.
invalidmoodleversion: Invalid Totara LMS version. The minium version required is 9.0.
localmobileunexpectedresponse: Totara LMS Mobile Additional Features check returned an unexpected response, you will be authenticated using the standard Mobile service.
logininsiterequired: You need to log in to the site in a browser window.
mobileservicesnotenabled: Mobile Services are not enabled in your site. Please, contact your Totara LMS site administrator if you think mobile access should be enabled.
newsitedescription: Please enter the URL of your Totara LMS site. Note that it might not be configured to work with this app.
notloggedin: You need to be logged in.
reconnectdescription: Your authentication token is invalid or has expired, you have to reconnect to the site.
reconnectssodescription: Your authentication token is invalid or has expired, you have to reconnect to the site. You need to log in to the site in a browser window.
siteinmaintenance: Your site is in maintenance mode
siteurlrequired: Site URL required, i.e http://www.yourtotarasite.abc or https://www.yourtotarasite.efg
webservicesnotenabled: Web Services are not enabled in your site. Please, contact your Totara LMS site administrator if you think mobile access should be enabled.
